notes.text:
Still waiting for damn card trader to give me 3rd grass. I'm a grass maniac since the tcg so this was a must have in this game. Skill successor literally wins games; seeing as red-eyes issues is getting over high beatsticks. ties that binds helps in mirror

Glads; ez
Dino's; very ez
CA's; hard without econ, otherwise pretty good
Ancient Gears; Very ez; bless skill successor
Mirror; Ez
Burn; average without s/t removal, otherwise ez. Especially counterblow variants. Samurai skull don't care
Hazy; Ez unless the otk beatdown variant gets away with it and no defense on your part
Phoenix; very ez


Its important to eye what you send with grass since gozuki could potentially trigger and you don't want to remove bacon savor, only samurai skulls. on rare ocassion you would remove rez if no samurai skull depending on hand. I would replace a wild t for 3rd grass
